拂.definition: to flick; to brush off; (of a breeze) to brush lightly over; (literary) to run counter to

拂動.definition: (of a breeze) to make (hair, leaves, clothing etc) sway gently; to ruffle

拂士.definition: attendant to the emperor; wise counselor

拂袖而去.definition: to storm off in a huff (idiom)

拂逆.definition: to go against; to do sth contrary to (sb's wishes)
